name: Boudica
description: Celtic warrior queen who led a revolt against the Romans in Britain.

name: Miyamoto Musashi
description: Legendary Japanese swordsman, strategist, and philosopher.

name: Harriet Tubman
description: Abolitionist and conductor of the Underground Railroad, leading enslaved people to freedom.

name: Olga of Kiev
description: Regent of Kievan Rus' who avenged her husband's death with legendary ruthlessness and later converted to Christianity.

name: Joan of Arc
description: French heroine and military leader who led French forces during the Hundred Years' War.

name: Genghis Khan
description: Founder of the Mongol Empire, uniting nomadic tribes and conquering vast territories.
